KitchenWaveservant01.synopsis: A waveservant that is busy in the kitchen area of Water Queen's HouseAfter the Beastmaster quest is completed, the ceremony is no longer going on, so they have a different dialog then.
KitchenWaveservant01.how_to_trigger: 1. Go to CTY_Main_Agoto -263.6; 5.5; -263.5812. Talk to the waveservant

AD_VaultGuaardWaveservantsChat.synopsis: Chatter between the vault guards that the player will hear if they use stealth to get to the vault.

AD_UmberleeFollower02.synopsis: She's saying a prayer to Umberlee before giving the offering. In her one line dialog she suggests she wants to get this over with very quickly and leave, but needs to say her prayers first.

Waveservant02.synopsis: One of the waveservants, singing on the funeral. Won't talk to a player during the funeral, won't tell much after that too.After the Beastmaster quest is completed, the ceremony is no longer going on, so they have a different dialog then.
Waveservant02.how_to_trigger: 1. Go to CTY_Main_A2. Talk to one of the waveservants-246.957; 6.5; -264.804

PAD_Barrier.synopsis: A player gets to an obstacle in the Water Queen's House's cellar. If they pass a Perception check, they discover that the rock wall is cracked and can be destructed.

KitchenWaveservant02.synopsis: A waveservant that is busy in the kitchen area of Water Queen's HouseAfter the Beastmaster quest is completed, the ceremony is no longer going on, so they have a different dialog then.
KitchenWaveservant02.how_to_trigger: 1. Go to CTY_Main_Agoto -260.453; 5.5; -251.7182. Talk to the waveservant

VaultWaveservant_CallForHelp.synopsis: Next time a player is spotted by S_LOW_VaultWaveservant, or commits a crime, in Offering's Vault, she'll call sahuagins for help.
VaultWaveservant_CallForHelp.how_to_trigger: 1. Launch CTY_Main_A2. Get to Offerings Vault in the cellar and wait for a waveservant to arrive3. Try that againgoto -1821.478; 3.243; -74.007

UmberleeFollower01.synopsis: A small dialogue with Umberlee follower that came to Water Queen's House to give offerings to the Sea Queen. Ideas for a character: your typical sea-sailor, he's afraid of Umberlee but really believes that offerings are required for smooth sailing.

AD_UmberleeFollowersChat.synopsis: Umberlee Follower 01 and 04 talk about offerings to Umberlee.
AD_UmberleeFollowersChat.how_to_trigger: Automatically plays between UmberleeFollower01 and 04. Only plays while both of them are there. At some point Umberlee Follower01 will bring an offering and leave his position, so this dialog will stop until he's back.

CellarWaveservant01.synopsis: A waveservant in the Cellar area of Water Queen's House stops the player to warn about "dangers" that await them ahead
CellarWaveservant01.how_to_trigger: 1. CTY_Main_A2. Talk to CellarWaveservant01 or get into spot trigger around hergoto -1787.596; 0.197; -98.252

UmberleeFollower03.synopsis: A small dialogue with Umberlee follower that came to Water Queen's House to give offerings to the Sea Queen.Ideas for a character: he's just afraid and maybe he has a story to tell (or hint on it) to prove his fear to the random stranger.

PAD_TempleEntrance.synopsis: Characters hear the sound in the back of Water Queen's House and wondering what's happened. (There's also blood on the temple's entrance... so maybe they could mention that or tie together)

VaultWaveservant_Spotted.synopsis: If a S_LOW_VaultWaveservant spots a player in a restricted area (Offering's Vault and a guardroom nearby), she'll start a dialogue, warning a player.
VaultWaveservant_Spotted.how_to_trigger: 1. Launch CTY_Main_A2. Get to Offerings Vault in the cellar and wait for a waveservant to arrivegoto -1821.478; 3.243; -74.007

GuardWaveservant03.synopsis: A waveservant that guards Offering's chest
GuardWaveservant03.how_to_trigger: 1. Go to CTY_Main_Agoto -258.624; 5.502; -233.5422. Talk to the guard waveservant

AllandraGrey.synopsis: Player talks to Allandra Grey, the Flood Tide (High Priestes) that serves the Water Queen. She's somewhat cold and strict. Talking to her will give some information about the funeral that is happening in the temple, and eventually she gives out the quest Waveservant's Demise, where player should investigate the murder of her waveservant.
AllandraGrey.how_to_trigger: 1. Load CTY_Main_A2. Talk to Allandra Greygoto -247.283, -258.103

Waveservant05.synopsis: One of the waveservants, singing on the funeral. Won't talk to a player during the funeral, won't tell much after that too.After the Beastmaster quest is completed, the ceremony is no longer going on, so they have a different dialog then.
Waveservant05.how_to_trigger: 1. Go to CTY_Main_A2. Talk to one of the waveservants-246.957; 6.5; -264.804

AD_KichenWaveservantsChat.how_to_trigger: Automatically plays between KitchenWaveservant01 and 02 in the kitchen while both of them are available.

AD_AllandraBusy.synopsis: This AD will play if you try to talk to Allandra in her office.

Waveservant03.synopsis: One of the waveservants, singing on the funeral. Won't talk to a player during the funeral, won't tell much after that too.After the Beastmaster quest is completed, the ceremony is no longer going on, so they have a different dialog then.
Waveservant03.how_to_trigger: 1. Go to CTY_Main_A2. Talk to one of the waveservants-246.957; 6.5; -264.804

Waveservant01.synopsis: One of the waveservants, singing on the funeral. Won't talk to a player during the funeral, won't tell much after that too.After the Beastmaster quest is completed, the ceremony is no longer going on, so they have a different dialog then.
Waveservant01.how_to_trigger: 1. Go to CTY_Main_A2. Talk to one of the waveservants-246.957; 6.5; -264.804

CellarWaveservant02.synopsis: A waveservant in the Cellar area of Water Queen's House, that doesn't really want to talk to players

UmberleeFollower04.synopsis: One liner for a follower of Umberlee. She's talking to Umberlee Follower 01 in a repeated AD.
UmberleeFollower04.how_to_trigger: Talk to S_LOW_UmberleeFollower04_ba52a7af-885a-4298-9fe1-32bc8c67cc8a in the Waterqueen's house.

Waveservant06.synopsis: A waveservant working in Water Queen's House.After the Beastmaster quest is completed, the ceremony is no longer going on, so they have a different dialog then.
Waveservant06.how_to_trigger: 1. Go to CTY_Main_Agoto -246.187; 6.5; -243.312. Talk to the waveservant

Waveservant04.synopsis: One of the waveservants, singing on the funeral. Won't talk to a player during the funeral, won't tell much after that too.After the Beastmaster quest is completed, the ceremony is no longer going on, so they have a different dialog then.
Waveservant04.how_to_trigger: 1. Go to CTY_Main_A2. Talk to one of the waveservants-246.957; 6.5; -264.804

HolliDylford_SpeakWithDead.synopsis: SwD with Holli Dylford, the dead waveservant in Water Queen's House
HolliDylford_SpeakWithDead.how_to_trigger: 1. Load CTY_Main_A2. Talk to Allandra Grey and accept the questgoto -247.283; 6.5; -258.1033. Cast Speak with Dead on a body on the altargoto -247.1; 6.5; -260.67

VaultWaveservant.synopsis: A player can try to talk to a waveservant that transfers items from offerings chest to Offerings Vault.She's not talkative, but with enough persuasion she can tell what's her task.
VaultWaveservant.how_to_trigger: 1. Launch CTY_Main_A2. Talk to a waveservant that is in patrol between Water Queen's House and Offerings Vault in the cellarChest:goto -257.555; 5.502; -235.268

AD_StealFromUmberlee.synopsis: Will play if the player is caught stealing from the vault. Uses Allandra as the speaker for now butwe imagine this to be the voice of Umberlee
AD_StealFromUmberlee.how_to_trigger: 1. CTY_Main_A2. Steal from the water queen's house

AD_WaveservantsWrath.synopsis: Waveservants react on players doing something horrible (e.g push the body from the altar)
AD_WaveservantsWrath.how_to_trigger: 1. CTY_Main_A2. Push the waveservant's body from the altargoto -246.896; 7.099; -260.677

GuardWaveservant02.synopsis: A waveservant that guards Allandra's office
GuardWaveservant02.how_to_trigger: 1. Go to CTY_Main_Agoto -240.634; 10.501; -249.1962. Talk to the guard waveservant

StopInterruptingFuneral.synopsis: Player gets this narrator line when tries to interact with a body of a dead waveservant without permission
StopInterruptingFuneral.how_to_trigger: 1. Load CTY_Main_A2. Don't accept Allandra's quest and make sure that waveservants around see you3. Interact with a body on the altargoto -247.1; 6.5; -260.67

ChattyWaveservant.synopsis: Other waveservants are not so keen to talk about anything, but this one will answer some player's questions. And also will tell some rumours about waveservant's death.
ChattyWaveservant.how_to_trigger: 1. Load CTY_Main_A2. Talk to Waveservant near the entrance of Water Queen's House (TBD)goto -246.389; 5.5; -203.484

UmberleeFollower02.synopsis: A small dialogue with Umberlee follower that came to Water Queen's House to give offerings to the Sea Queen.Ideas for a character: she hates Umberlee but too afraid to forget about "her part".

AD_OfferingsChat.synopsis: The two waveservants close to the offerings at the temple entrance discuss taking the offerings to te cellar.
AD_OfferingsChat.how_to_trigger: 1. CTY_Main_A2. Walk towards the offerings chest at the temple entrance.

AD_CellarWaveservantsChat.synopsis: Cellar waveservants chatting with each other (probably we need alternatives dialogues, for now it's only on)
AD_CellarWaveservantsChat.how_to_trigger: 1. CTY_Main_A2. Enter the cellar and reach the statue to trigger AD on CellarWaveservantsgoto -1791.967; 0.197; -108.997

GuardWaveservant01.synopsis: A waveservant that guards Allandra's office
GuardWaveservant01.how_to_trigger: 1. Go to CTY_Main_Agoto -240.709; 10.501; -253.82. Talk to the guard waveservant

KitchenWaveservant01_0.speaker: Untaken Zastreya
KitchenWaveservant01_0.text: Finally some peace and quiet. Too bad about all the cleanup.
KitchenWaveservant01_0.context: NodeContext: Relieved (but still a little annoyed on the last sentence)

KitchenWaveservant01_1.speaker: Untaken Zastreya
KitchenWaveservant01_1.text: Unless you're gonna roll up your sleeves, you can get out of my kitchen. Please.
KitchenWaveservant01_1.context: NodeContext: Mildly annoyed; she has things to do (the "please" is definitely an afterthought)

KitchenWaveservant01_2.speaker: Untaken Zastreya
KitchenWaveservant01_2.text: Out from under my feet, little weed.
KitchenWaveservant01_2.context: NodeContext: Irritated (is calling the player "little weed")

KitchenWaveservant01_3.speaker: Untaken Zastreya
KitchenWaveservant01_3.text: Fish's piss - I loved Holli as much as anyone, but they've been wailing and praying for hours. My best pot for a bit of quiet.
KitchenWaveservant01_3.context: NodeContext: Annoyed by the loud funeral singing next door; "fish's piss" said as if it's a swear

AD_VaultGuaardWaveservantsChat_2.speaker: Dark Breaker Elonia
AD_VaultGuaardWaveservantsChat_2.text: So what was your Drowning like, then?

AD_VaultGuaardWaveservantsChat_8.speaker: Seawind Raheni
AD_VaultGuaardWaveservantsChat_8.context: NodeContext: As if it's no big deal

AD_VaultGuaardWaveservantsChat_7.speaker: Seawind Raheni
AD_VaultGuaardWaveservantsChat_7.text: Swallowed a load of water, woke up with the Flood Tide standing over me. Done.

AD_VaultGuaardWaveservantsChat_3.speaker: Dark Breaker Elonia
AD_VaultGuaardWaveservantsChat_3.text: Not my favourite experience - but well worth it to be so blessed by Umberlee.
AD_VaultGuaardWaveservantsChat_3.context: NodeContext: As if recalling an unpleasant - but necessary - chore

AD_VaultGuaardWaveservantsChat_0.speaker: Dark Breaker Elonia
AD_VaultGuaardWaveservantsChat_0.context: InternalNodeContext: This is a nameNodeContext: Curiously (wants to know what her peer's experience was like). GEER-a (hard 'g').

AD_VaultGuaardWaveservantsChat_4.speaker: Dark Breaker Gira
AD_VaultGuaardWaveservantsChat_4.text: Knew that wouldn't be enough for you.

AD_VaultGuaardWaveservantsChat_1.speaker: Dark Breaker Gira
AD_VaultGuaardWaveservantsChat_1.text: Watch it, you - there's no guarantee Umberlee'll save you from a second drowning.

AD_VaultGuaardWaveservantsChat_16.speaker: Seawind Raheni
AD_VaultGuaardWaveservantsChat_16.text: All right, you two - I get it. I'll behave.

AD_VaultGuaardWaveservantsChat_17.speaker: Dark Breaker Gira
AD_VaultGuaardWaveservantsChat_17.text: Started to panic, didn't I? Took three waveservants to hold me under.
AD_VaultGuaardWaveservantsChat_17.context: NodeContext: Slightly embarrassed at telling this story

AD_VaultGuaardWaveservantsChat_12.speaker: Dark Breaker Gira
AD_VaultGuaardWaveservantsChat_12.text: Don't think they would've minded if I didn't wake up afterwards.

AD_VaultGuaardWaveservantsChat_11.speaker: Dark Breaker Gira
AD_VaultGuaardWaveservantsChat_11.text: Too bad for them I did.

AD_VaultGuaardWaveservantsChat_5.speaker: Dark Breaker Elonia
AD_VaultGuaardWaveservantsChat_5.text: Ah, but it was worth it in the end, wasn't it?
AD_VaultGuaardWaveservantsChat_5.context: NodeContext: Believes this/trying to emphasise the positive

AD_VaultGuaardWaveservantsChat_10.speaker: Dark Breaker Gira
AD_VaultGuaardWaveservantsChat_10.text: Oh, aye - me and the Bitch Queen are best mates now.

AD_VaultGuaardWaveservantsChat_18.speaker: Dark Breaker Gira
AD_VaultGuaardWaveservantsChat_18.text: She's just a demanding lady. But so am I.

AD_UmberleeFollower02_0.speaker: Dilgar Sneese
AD_UmberleeFollower02_0.text: Oh mighty Umberlee, hear my prayer!
AD_UmberleeFollower02_0.context: NodeContext: Trying to be suitably grand with this prayer

AD_UmberleeFollower02_1.speaker: Dilgar Sneese
AD_UmberleeFollower02_1.text: You're the unrivalled Queen of the... sea? Surf... waves! Wavemother! Oh, cocks...
AD_UmberleeFollower02_1.context: NodeContext: Struggling to remember the words of the prayer/make up a good one

AD_UmberleeFollower02_2.speaker: Dilgar Sneese
AD_UmberleeFollower02_2.text: Please grant me your blessing - I'm leaving you a nice fat purse I swiped and my favourite belt buckle. Thanks. I mean thank you.
AD_UmberleeFollower02_2.context: NodeContext: Bringing her shaky attempt at a prayer home with the important stuff (and trying to end politely despite herself)

AD_UmberleeFollower02_3.speaker: Dilgar Sneese
AD_UmberleeFollower02_3.text: Oh mighty Wavemother - I implore you for safe passage on my next sea... passage. Uh...
AD_UmberleeFollower02_3.context: NodeContext: Struggling to remember the words of the prayer/make up a good one

Waveservant02_0.speaker: Seawind Slow-Boat Drubella
Waveservant02_0.context: InternalNodeContext: Interrupted while singing a funeral requiemNodeContext: Ecstatic

Waveservant02_1.speaker: Seawind Slow-Boat Drubella
Waveservant02_1.text: I wonder if the Wavemother will call me next...

Waveservant02_2.speaker: Seawind Slow-Boat Drubella
Waveservant02_2.text: May you, too, feel Umberlee's embrace one day.
Waveservant02_2.context: NodeContext: Warmly (but it's actually a little sinister if you think about it)

Waveservant02_3.speaker: Seawind Slow-Boat Drubella
Waveservant02_3.text: Feel the joy of Umberlee lap against your soul!
Waveservant02_3.context: InternalNodeContext: Interrupted while singing a funeral requiemNodeContext: Ecstatic

PAD_Barrier_0.speaker: Player
PAD_Barrier_0.text: I think we can go through here - with a bit of force.

KitchenWaveservant02_0.speaker: Untaken Padulla
KitchenWaveservant02_0.text: Don't worry - the drinks'll be served with the food. Just wish Holli was here to enjoy them...
KitchenWaveservant02_0.context: NodeContext: Preoccupied with preparing drinks; a little sad on the last sentence

KitchenWaveservant02_1.speaker: Untaken Padulla
KitchenWaveservant02_1.text: It was a lovely ceremony, wasn't it? Holli would've been touched.
KitchenWaveservant02_1.context: NodeContext: Sentimental; a little sadder on the second sentence

KitchenWaveservant02_2.speaker: Untaken Padulla
KitchenWaveservant02_2.text: At least Holli's with Umberlee now.
KitchenWaveservant02_2.context: NodeContext: Sadly (but pleased her friend's soul has moved on)

KitchenWaveservant02_3.speaker: Untaken Padulla
KitchenWaveservant02_3.text: Hands off the drinks. We have enough to fill Grey Harbour, but it's all for the funeral.

UmberleeFollower01_6.speaker: Captain Foharell
UmberleeFollower01_6.text: Got to make sure all my ships are covered - perhaps we'll cross paths in a tavern later, eh?
UmberleeFollower01_6.context: NodeContext: Still friendly, just focused on the task at hand

UmberleeFollower01_10.speaker: Captain Foharell
UmberleeFollower01_10.text: Here to make an offering to Umberlee as well, eh? They say it's good luck to placate the Bitch Queen after a drowning.

UmberleeFollower01_9.speaker: Captain Foharell
UmberleeFollower01_9.text: Even though you're already here and all?
UmberleeFollower01_9.context: NodeContext: A little incredulous but still warm/friendly about it

UmberleeFollower01_3.speaker: Captain Foharell
UmberleeFollower01_3.text: Maybe Umberlee will set her hand to all the strangeness going on in Grey Harbour now she's lost one of her own.

UmberleeFollower01_0.speaker: Player
UmberleeFollower01_0.text: Do all these offerings even do anything?

UmberleeFollower01_1.speaker: Captain Foharell
UmberleeFollower01_1.text: When you've sailed as much as I have, you'll know damn well they do plenty.
UmberleeFollower01_1.context: NodeContext: Very sure of this fact

UmberleeFollower01_5.speaker: Captain Foharell
UmberleeFollower01_5.text: Got a few spare coins to chuck in the fountain? Certainly wouldn't do you any harm.

UmberleeFollower01_4.speaker: Captain Foharell
UmberleeFollower01_4.text: It's an impressive temple, I'll give you that.
UmberleeFollower01_4.context: NodeContext: Genuinely impressed by said temple

UmberleeFollower01_8.speaker: Captain Foharell
UmberleeFollower01_8.text: Word of warning, though: I wouldn't spend too long nosing around - Umberlee likes her visitors to have a bit of purpose about them.

AD_UmberleeFollowersChat_6.speaker: Captain Foharell
AD_UmberleeFollowersChat_6.text: Not if you want to be sure you have Umberlee on your side.

AD_UmberleeFollowersChat_1.speaker: Captain Goldwake
AD_UmberleeFollowersChat_1.text: Ugh, you're right. Of course you're right.

AD_UmberleeFollowersChat_4.speaker: Captain Foharell
AD_UmberleeFollowersChat_4.text: It's easily remedied - you just need to honour the Bitch Queen as she deserves.

AD_UmberleeFollowersChat_5.speaker: Captain Goldwake
AD_UmberleeFollowersChat_5.text: She's gonna send me to the bottom of the sea, isn't she?

AD_UmberleeFollowersChat_8.speaker: Captain Foharell
AD_UmberleeFollowersChat_8.text: Not if she knows you've given her all you can. Best start praying up a storm right now, though.
AD_UmberleeFollowersChat_8.context: NodeContext: Reassuringly - definitely means that last sentence though

AD_UmberleeFollowersChat_7.speaker: Captain Foharell
AD_UmberleeFollowersChat_7.text: She's fond of trinkets - valuable ones, mind. Or if you give her something precious of yours.

AD_UmberleeFollowersChat_3.speaker: Captain Foharell
AD_UmberleeFollowersChat_3.text: Just make sure to sweeten the deal with plenty of gold.
AD_UmberleeFollowersChat_3.context: NodeContext: As if remembering an important point

AD_UmberleeFollowersChat_2.speaker: Captain Goldwake
AD_UmberleeFollowersChat_2.text: Gods, I've barely enough to keep my ship sailing - let alone extra for Umberlee.

CellarWaveservant01_0.speaker: Dark Breaker Ohara Ohira
CellarWaveservant01_0.text: Stop! You can't go back there.
CellarWaveservant01_0.context: NodeContext: Annoyed/angry; wants the player to leave this restricted area ASAP

CellarWaveservant01_1.speaker: Dark Breaker Ohara Ohira
CellarWaveservant01_1.text: Please go back upstairs - before we all get in trouble.

CellarWaveservant01_2.speaker: Dark Breaker Ohara Ohira
CellarWaveservant01_2.text: You shouldn't be down here. This place is off-limits to laypeople.
CellarWaveservant01_2.context: NodeContext: Annoyed; wants the player to leave this restricted area ASAP

UmberleeFollower03_0.speaker: Doctor Fairwise
UmberleeFollower03_0.text: Not sure what kind of offering you'd make to keep a giant beast at bay - a bit more than just gold, probably.

UmberleeFollower03_1.speaker: Doctor Fairwise
UmberleeFollower03_1.text: Did you hear the waveservants talking about a beast in Grey Harbour? If that's true, prayers are the least we can do.

PAD_TempleEntrance_0.speaker: Player
PAD_TempleEntrance_0.text: Hear that? Chanting at the back of the temple - and blood stains all over.
PAD_TempleEntrance_0.context: NodeContext: Gale: 'Umberlee' is the name of the goddess worshipped here. He's familar, as she's got a lot of presence in Waterdeep

VaultWaveservant_Spotted_3.speaker: Untaken Fitzy Relma
VaultWaveservant_Spotted_3.text: Stop! What are you doing down here?

VaultWaveservant_Spotted_7.speaker: Untaken Fitzy Relma
VaultWaveservant_Spotted_7.text: You know what? Never mind what you're doing - leave or I'll call for help.

VaultWaveservant_Spotted_6.speaker: Player
VaultWaveservant_Spotted_6.text: I've seen your 'help' - I think I can handle them.

VaultWaveservant_Spotted_0.speaker: Player
VaultWaveservant_Spotted_0.text: Your scaly friends are gone - you'll have to deal with me yourself.

VaultWaveservant_Spotted_4.speaker: Untaken Fitzy Relma
VaultWaveservant_Spotted_4.text: You again. What are you doing?

GuardWaveservant03_0.speaker: Seawind Star Stolitti
GuardWaveservant03_0.context: NodeContext: Mild threat/annoyance; wants the player to behave and leave them alone

GuardWaveservant03_1.speaker: Seawind Star Stolitti
GuardWaveservant03_1.text: The Wavemother sees all - even you.
GuardWaveservant03_1.context: NodeContext: Mild threat; wants to make sure the player behaves

AllandraGrey_2.speaker: Flood Tide Allandra Grey
AllandraGrey_2.text: Rejoice, sisters, for Umberlee has blessed her humble daughter with a pure death!

AllandraGrey_63.speaker: Flood Tide Allandra Grey
AllandraGrey_63.text: Her lips blue with her kiss, her lungs full of her quenching word!

AllandraGrey_23.speaker: Flood Tide Allandra Grey
AllandraGrey_23.text: Umberlee's mercy saved her from a slow, sinking death in the beast's shadow!

AllandraGrey_58.speaker: Flood Tide Allandra Grey
AllandraGrey_58.text: How dare this beast sully the safety of Grey Harbour!

AllandraGrey_14.speaker: Flood Tide Allandra Grey
AllandraGrey_14.text: We will find its master and send him struggling into the Bitch Queen's embrace!

AllandraGrey_74.speaker: Flood Tide Allandra Grey
AllandraGrey_74.text: Not a sweet sleep like Holli's, but a suffocating flood of fruitless gasps and bursting flesh!
AllandraGrey_74.context: CinematicNodeContext: Camera on corpse of the dead waveservant on an altar; back onto Allandra afterNodeContext: Ecstatic/triumphant

AllandraGrey_96.speaker: Flood Tide Allandra Grey
AllandraGrey_96.text: You! Supplicant! What tribute do you bring to honour the Wavemother's fallen daughter?

AllandraGrey_30.speaker: Flood Tide Allandra Grey
AllandraGrey_30.text: A fine offering always appreciated in the eyes of the Wavemother.
AllandraGrey_30.context: NodeContext: Pleased by the offering of gold

AllandraGrey_24.speaker: Flood Tide Allandra Grey
AllandraGrey_24.text: A layperson's prayers - crude but earnest.

AllandraGrey_64.speaker: Player
AllandraGrey_64.text: I've brought my weapon to help avenge her death.

AllandraGrey_18.speaker: Flood Tide Allandra Grey
AllandraGrey_18.text: Yes! Then you know as well as Umberlee that blood must soon be shed.
AllandraGrey_18.context: NodeContext: Excited by the prospect of revenge

AllandraGrey_44.speaker: Flood Tide Allandra Grey
AllandraGrey_44.text: Your tribute is well received. Breathe deep as she permits.
AllandraGrey_44.context: NodeContext: Pleased by the player's offering to Umberlee

AllandraGrey_8.speaker: Flood Tide Allandra Grey
AllandraGrey_8.text: Holli, one of Umberlee's beloved waveservants.

AllandraGrey_37.speaker: Flood Tide Allandra Grey
AllandraGrey_37.text: Blessed Umberlee saw fit to spare her an ignoble death, but her passing was not as the Wavemother intended.

AllandraGrey_50.speaker: Flood Tide Allandra Grey
AllandraGrey_50.text: It was a beast who took her life - an unnatural one whose very existence is an affront to Umberlee.

AllandraGrey_34.speaker: Flood Tide Allandra Grey
AllandraGrey_34.text: A wretched metal monstrosity hewn by hubris.

AllandraGrey_55.speaker: Flood Tide Allandra Grey
AllandraGrey_55.text: A rusting pollutant that bleeds black blood into Umberlee's pristine waters.

AllandraGrey_29.speaker: Player
AllandraGrey_29.text: How did Umberlee 'spare her an ignoble death'?

AllandraGrey_17.speaker: Flood Tide Allandra Grey
AllandraGrey_17.text: The beast struck Holli while she was swimming in Grey Harbour. She was found by some fishermen.

AllandraGrey_43.speaker: Flood Tide Allandra Grey
AllandraGrey_43.text: She would have suffered a terrible, agonising death had Umberlee not bestowed upon her the mercy of drowning.
AllandraGrey_43.context: NodeContext: Truly, fanatically believes the drowning was a mercy

AllandraGrey_45.speaker: Player
AllandraGrey_45.text: I'm good at slaying beasts - maybe I could help you.

AllandraGrey_39.speaker: Player
AllandraGrey_39.text: I have yet to meet a beast I couldn't slay. If you need a hunter, you've found one.

AllandraGrey_51.speaker: Flood Tide Allandra Grey
AllandraGrey_51.text: The Queen of the Depths is generous to those who serve her - and her favour is far less deadly than her wrath.
AllandraGrey_51.context: NodeContext: Keen for the player to help her; confident in Umberlee's bounty

AllandraGrey_89.speaker: Flood Tide Allandra Grey
AllandraGrey_89.text: Find the master of this poisonous beast and slay him - then one of her most precious gifts shall be yours.
AllandraGrey_89.context: NodeContext: Keen for the player to help her; confident in Umberlee's bounty

AllandraGrey_57.speaker: Narrator
AllandraGrey_57.text:
*You're reminded of the man you met beneath the Grey Harbour - and the submersible he
commanded.*

AllandraGrey_16.speaker: Narrator
AllandraGrey_16.text: *You're reminded of the Banite's submersible. Could they be connected?*

AllandraGrey_10.speaker: Player
AllandraGrey_10.text: This 'precious gift' isn't drowning, is it?

AllandraGrey_65.speaker: Flood Tide Allandra Grey
AllandraGrey_65.text: Pft, that privilege is not yours to earn.
AllandraGrey_65.context: NodeContext: Dismissive; the player is not worthy of such a fate in her eyes

AllandraGrey_25.speaker: Player
AllandraGrey_25.text: Where can I find the beast's master?

AllandraGrey_54.speaker: Flood Tide Allandra Grey
AllandraGrey_54.text: We haven't found its lair as yet - perhaps you can find where the beast takes its slumber and skewer it before it wakes.
AllandraGrey_54.context: NodeContext: Intense; wants the beast's master gone

AllandraGrey_1.speaker: Player
AllandraGrey_1.text: All right - I'll see what I can do.

AllandraGrey_26.speaker: Flood Tide Allandra Grey
AllandraGrey_26.text: Salt kiss your brow! We await your return - and the beastmaster's demise.
AllandraGrey_26.context: NodeContext: Ecstatic; very glad the player is going to help

AllandraGrey_77.speaker: Player
AllandraGrey_77.text: I suspect I know the origins of this 'beast'. I'll see what I can do.

AllandraGrey_40.speaker: Player
AllandraGrey_40.text: I think I know the master of the 'poisonous beast'. I'll see what I can do.

AllandraGrey_73.speaker: Player
AllandraGrey_73.text: The 'beast's master' has been dealt with. You're welcome.

AllandraGrey_27.speaker: Player
AllandraGrey_27.text: The 'beast's master' has already left the city - I found his resignation letter. Your waters are safe.

AllandraGrey_91.speaker: Player
AllandraGrey_91.text: Sorry, I don't have time for this.

AllandraGrey_83.speaker: Flood Tide Allandra Grey
AllandraGrey_83.text: There is always time for the tides - pray you never get caught in them.

AllandraGrey_69.speaker: Player
AllandraGrey_69.text: I'm not getting involved in this.

AllandraGrey_85.speaker: Flood Tide Allandra Grey
AllandraGrey_85.text: Then I hope you never have need of the sea's benevolence.

AllandraGrey_86.speaker: Player
AllandraGrey_86.text: This is one of the more upbeat funerals I've attended.

AllandraGrey_21.speaker: Flood Tide Allandra Grey
AllandraGrey_21.text: We are celebrating an act of divine mercy!

AllandraGrey_75.speaker: Player
AllandraGrey_75.text: Nice corpse. What are we celebrating?

AllandraGrey_66.speaker: Player
AllandraGrey_66.text: I haven't brought any tribute, actually.

AllandraGrey_71.speaker: Flood Tide Allandra Grey
AllandraGrey_71.text: Then you'd better have a good reason for approaching so brazenly.
AllandraGrey_71.context: NodeContext: Slightly irritated by the player's lack of an offering

AllandraGrey_98.speaker: Player
AllandraGrey_98.text: I will pray to my god for her salvation.

AllandraGrey_15.speaker: Flood Tide Allandra Grey
AllandraGrey_15.text: The other gods do not look kindly on the Bitch Queen - but she looks kindly upon your prayers, priest.

AllandraGrey_31.speaker: Player
AllandraGrey_31.text: I wish her soul the stillness of a calmed ocean.

AllandraGrey_72.speaker: Flood Tide Allandra Grey
AllandraGrey_72.text: As still as the water in her halted lungs! A most fitting tribute, received with gratitude.
AllandraGrey_72.context: NodeContext: first sentence agreeing with player, almost congratulatory (to another zealot who's died a noble death)

AllandraGrey_46.speaker: Flood Tide Allandra Grey
AllandraGrey_46.text: Yes! Rage and rebel against the beast and its master! A tribute most fitting.

AllandraGrey_60.speaker: Flood Tide Allandra Grey
AllandraGrey_60.text: May the Wavemother grant you her favour - or at least, spare you her wrath.

AllandraGrey_70.speaker: Flood Tide Allandra Grey
AllandraGrey_70.text: Is it done? Have you slain the beastmaster?
AllandraGrey_70.context: NodeContext: Enthusiastically hopeful about the beastmaster's death

AllandraGrey_79.speaker: Player
AllandraGrey_79.text: The 'beast's master' left Baldur's Gate - I found his resignation letter. Your waters are safe.

AllandraGrey_3.speaker: Flood Tide Allandra Grey
AllandraGrey_3.text: Umberlee smiles on us all! Thank you for enacting her blessed vengeance - may the tides crush his bones to sand.
AllandraGrey_3.context: NodeContext: Exultant on the first sentence, then grateful (and vicious after the -)

AllandraGrey_67.speaker: Flood Tide Allandra Grey
AllandraGrey_67.text: As promised. The Wavemother rewards those who submit to her will.
AllandraGrey_67.context: InternalNodeContext: Receive reward for completing the questNodeContext: Reverently bestowing a reward on the deserving player

AllandraGrey_80.speaker: Flood Tide Allandra Grey
AllandraGrey_80.text: May the seas be as kind as you deserve.
AllandraGrey_80.context: NodeContext: A warm - if slightly threatening-sounding - farewell

AllandraGrey_53.speaker: Player
AllandraGrey_53.text: Remind me what the beast did to your waveservant.

AllandraGrey_38.speaker: Flood Tide Allandra Grey
AllandraGrey_38.text: Holli was swimming in Grey Harbour - as we all do. The beast struck her and she lost consciousness - Umberlee eased her passing.

AllandraGrey_47.speaker: Player
AllandraGrey_47.text: Where can I find this beastmaster again?

AllandraGrey_52.speaker: Flood Tide Allandra Grey
AllandraGrey_52.text: Then come back when you have. The Wavemother is rarely patient.

AllandraGrey_76.speaker: Flood Tide Allandra Grey
AllandraGrey_76.text: You have done the Bitch Queen's house a great deed - I pray that when you die, your lungs are blessed with her salted kisses.

AllandraGrey_82.speaker: Flood Tide Allandra Grey
AllandraGrey_82.text: Changeable as the sea - have you decided to help after all?

Waveservant05_0.speaker: Dark Breaker Mikki Kori
Waveservant05_0.text: May we all breathe deep of the Wavemother's waters!
Waveservant05_0.context: InternalNodeContext: Interrupted while singing a funeral requiemNodeContext: Ecstatic

Waveservant05_1.speaker: Dark Breaker Mikki Kori
Waveservant05_1.text: We won't forget this - and neither will Umberlee.
Waveservant05_1.context: NodeContext: Warmly (but still accidentally sounds a little like a threat)

Waveservant05_2.speaker: Dark Breaker Mikki Kori
Waveservant05_2.text: Oh, Umberlee, hear us! Umberlee, bring your daughter home!
Waveservant05_2.context: InternalNodeContext: Interrupted while singing a funeral requiemNodeContext: Ecstatic

Waveservant05_3.speaker: Dark Breaker Mikki Kori
Waveservant05_3.text: Our gratitude is as deep as the Sea of Swords! Thank you for avenging our sweet sister.

AD_KichenWaveservantsChat_0.speaker: Untaken Zastreya
AD_KichenWaveservantsChat_0.text: Tch, there's more bones than fish in this one.
AD_KichenWaveservantsChat_0.context: NodeContext: Annoyed at the fish she's filleting

AD_KichenWaveservantsChat_1.speaker: Untaken Padulla
AD_KichenWaveservantsChat_1.text: Did you want any rum for the marinade?
AD_KichenWaveservantsChat_1.context: NodeContext: Calling over from the other side of the room

AD_KichenWaveservantsChat_2.speaker: Untaken Padulla
AD_KichenWaveservantsChat_2.context: NodeContext: Calling over from the other side of the room

AD_KichenWaveservantsChat_3.speaker: Untaken Zastreya
AD_KichenWaveservantsChat_3.text: Go on, then - the spicier, the better.
AD_KichenWaveservantsChat_3.context: NodeContext: Calling over from the other side of the room

AD_AllandraBusy_0.speaker: Flood Tide Allandra Grey
AD_AllandraBusy_0.text: I've the Wavemother's temple to attend to.

Waveservant03_0.speaker: Dark Breaker Avgarioletta
Waveservant03_0.text: The Wavemother has righteously avenged our sister! We thank you for your hand in it.

Waveservant03_1.speaker: Dark Breaker Avgarioletta
Waveservant03_1.text: We are all her children! We are all hers!
Waveservant03_1.context: InternalNodeContext: Interrupted while singing a funeral requiemNodeContext: Ecstatic

Waveservant03_2.speaker: Dark Breaker Avgarioletta
Waveservant03_2.text: You have helped us, but be mindful - Umberlee is always watching.
Waveservant03_2.context: NodeContext: Kindly warning (or at least she thinks it is)

Waveservant03_3.speaker: Dark Breaker Avgarioletta
Waveservant03_3.text: Would that everyone knew the Wavemother's favour!
Waveservant03_3.context: InternalNodeContext: Interrupted while singing a funeral requiemNodeContext: Ecstatic

Waveservant01_0.speaker: Dark Breaker Sherrill
Waveservant01_0.text: Umberlee will surely watch over you after what you did for her. Thank you
Waveservant01_0.context: NodeContext: Warmly as the player helped them

Waveservant01_1.speaker: Dark Breaker Sherrill
Waveservant01_1.context: InternalNodeContext: Interrupted while singing a funeral requiemNodeContext: Ecstatic

Waveservant01_2.speaker: Dark Breaker Sherrill
Waveservant01_2.context: InternalNodeContext: Interrupted while singing a funeral requiemNodeContext: Ecstatic

Waveservant01_3.speaker: Dark Breaker Sherrill
Waveservant01_3.text: Umberlee heard our song - I know Holli's safe with her now.
Waveservant01_3.context: NodeContext: Sad for her friend but pleased with their song

CellarWaveservant02_0.speaker: Seawind Tinsy Ralpp
CellarWaveservant02_0.text: If you're hiding from the funeral, I don't blame you - just don't let Fitzy catch you down here.

CellarWaveservant02_1.speaker: Seawind Tinsy Ralpp
CellarWaveservant02_1.text: You look lost. The stairs behind you will take you back up to the temple, all right?

UmberleeFollower04_1.speaker: Captain Goldwake
UmberleeFollower04_1.text: Thought it wise to make an offering to the Sea Queen before sailing out tomorrow. Wasn't expecting to find the servants so preoccupied.

Waveservant06_0.speaker: Untaken Glone
Waveservant06_0.text: It's not too late to say a prayer in honour of our sister, should you wish to.

Waveservant06_1.speaker: Untaken Glone
Waveservant06_1.text: The ceremony's over but I can still hear the singing in my mind. You're lucky to have witnessed something so joyous.
Waveservant06_1.context: NodeContext: Warm but wistful, as if fondly recalling a wonderful party (and not a funeral)

Waveservant06_2.speaker: Untaken Glone
Waveservant06_2.text: If only we were all given such a blissful passing.

Waveservant06_3.speaker: Untaken Glone
Waveservant06_3.text: The celebration is in the main chamber. Praise Umberlee!
Waveservant06_3.context: NodeContext: Strangely exultant considering there's a funeral going on

Waveservant04_0.speaker: Seawind Flan Hawser
Waveservant04_0.context: InternalNodeContext: Interrupted while singing a funeral requiemNodeContext: Ecstatic

Waveservant04_1.speaker: Seawind Flan Hawser
Waveservant04_1.text: I'll say a prayer for you - I'm sure Umberlee will oblige.

Waveservant04_2.speaker: Seawind Flan Hawser
Waveservant04_2.text: I long for such a beautiful death!
Waveservant04_2.context: InternalNodeContext: Interrupted while singing a funeral requiemNodeContext: Ecstatic

Waveservant04_3.speaker: Seawind Flan Hawser
Waveservant04_3.text: You tamed the beastmaster. We thank you, friend.

HolliDylford_SpeakWithDead_13.speaker: Narrator
HolliDylford_SpeakWithDead_13.text: *The corpse does not stir. It will answer no more questions.*

HolliDylford_SpeakWithDead_23.speaker: Player
HolliDylford_SpeakWithDead_23.text: Do you remember what happened before you were attacked?

HolliDylford_SpeakWithDead_18.speaker: Holli Dylford
HolliDylford_SpeakWithDead_18.text: I was... swimming... I was... attacked...

HolliDylford_SpeakWithDead_7.speaker: Player
HolliDylford_SpeakWithDead_7.text: Tell me about this metal monster.

HolliDylford_SpeakWithDead_17.speaker: Holli Dylford
HolliDylford_SpeakWithDead_17.text: Big... fast... hit my head... everything went... black...

HolliDylford_SpeakWithDead_8.speaker: Holli Dylford
HolliDylford_SpeakWithDead_8.text: I was... swimming... in Grey Harbour...

HolliDylford_SpeakWithDead_19.speaker: Narrator
HolliDylford_SpeakWithDead_19.text: *The spell's power wanes. You can ask no more questions.*

HolliDylford_SpeakWithDead_15.speaker: Narrator
HolliDylford_SpeakWithDead_15.text: *A pointed glare informs you that you shouldn't go anywhere near the waveservant's body.*

HolliDylford_SpeakWithDead_21.speaker: Narrator
HolliDylford_SpeakWithDead_21.text: *The corpse seems willing to speak - but not to its killer.*

VaultWaveservant_0.speaker: Untaken Fitzy Relma
VaultWaveservant_0.text: Can't chat. These offerings need to be stowed before the next tide or there'll be Allandra to pay.

VaultWaveservant_1.speaker: Untaken Fitzy Relma
VaultWaveservant_1.text: There's two things I fear: Umberlee and Allandra. You're neither of those, so shoo.

AD_StealFromUmberlee_0.speaker: Umberlee
AD_StealFromUmberlee_0.text: You dare steal from the very sea that birthed you? Enjoy these breaths - they shall be your last.
AD_StealFromUmberlee_0.context: InternalNodeContext: Voice of the goddess UmberleeNodeContext: All-powerful goddess who has been wronged but knows the player will get their comeuppance

AD_WaveservantsWrath_0.speaker: GROUP_Act3_LOW_WaterQueensHouse_Waveservants
AD_WaveservantsWrath_0.text: May you wake with your lungs full of water!

GuardWaveservant02_0.speaker: Dark Breaker Norya Baker
GuardWaveservant02_0.text: Do you think I'm going to offer you a tour? Leave.

GuardWaveservant02_1.speaker: Dark Breaker Norya Baker
GuardWaveservant02_1.text: Get gone before I shuck you like an oyster.

StopInterruptingFuneral_0.speaker: Narrator
StopInterruptingFuneral_0.text: *A pointed glare informs you that you shouldn't go anywhere near the waveservant's body.*

ChattyWaveservant_0.speaker: Untaken Diomira Trellis
ChattyWaveservant_0.text: Please head inside - don't let me keep you from the celebrations.

ChattyWaveservant_5.speaker: Untaken Diomira Trellis
ChattyWaveservant_5.text: Oh Wavemother, Queen of the Depths - hear me. Please carry Holli to her final rest in the Deep Wilds. Please-
ChattyWaveservant_5.context: InternalNodeContext: Interrupted as she notices the playerNodeContext: Ecstatic prayer

ChattyWaveservant_10.speaker: Untaken Diomira Trellis
ChattyWaveservant_10.text: Sorry. Are you here for Waveservant Holli's funeral? It's already started - they're just inside.

ChattyWaveservant_6.speaker: Player
ChattyWaveservant_6.text: Is that what that singing is for?

ChattyWaveservant_9.speaker: Untaken Diomira Trellis
ChattyWaveservant_9.text: Yes! Please, you're most welcome - we have much to be thankful for.

ChattyWaveservant_3.speaker: Untaken Diomira Trellis
ChattyWaveservant_3.text: May the Wavemother smile on you as she did Holli.

ChattyWaveservant_11.speaker: Untaken Diomira Trellis
ChattyWaveservant_11.text: No, no - all are welcome to come and celebrate the life of a fallen waveservant.

UmberleeFollower02_0.speaker: Dilgar Sneese
UmberleeFollower02_0.text: I'm trying to get my prayers straight - don't want to piss off the Bitch Queen.
UmberleeFollower02_0.context: NodeContext: Slightly irritated; a little hushed/wary after the -

UmberleeFollower02_1.speaker: Dilgar Sneese
UmberleeFollower02_1.text: Sorry, mate, no time to chat - just here to make an offering then leave. In and out, yeah?

AD_OfferingsChat_0.speaker: Seawind Star Stolitti
AD_OfferingsChat_0.text: There's enough offerings in here for a trip to the vault - off you go, Fitzy.

AD_OfferingsChat_1.speaker: Untaken Fitzy Relma
AD_OfferingsChat_1.text: I was just about to, thanks. Wavemother's breath, you're so overbearing...
AD_OfferingsChat_1.context: NodeContext: Slightly annoyed at being told what to do

AD_CellarWaveservantsChat_2.speaker: Dark Breaker Ohara Ohira
AD_CellarWaveservantsChat_2.text: Do you think we could have saved Holli?

AD_CellarWaveservantsChat_10.speaker: Dark Breaker Ohara Ohira
AD_CellarWaveservantsChat_10.text: If... if Umberlee hadn't drowned her.
AD_CellarWaveservantsChat_10.context: NodeContext: Sadly; clearly finds it difficult to say

AD_CellarWaveservantsChat_0.speaker: Seawind Tinsy Ralpp
AD_CellarWaveservantsChat_0.context: NodeContext: Gently (but genuinely believes what she's saying)

AD_CellarWaveservantsChat_11.speaker: Seawind Tinsy Ralpp
AD_CellarWaveservantsChat_11.text: Just think what could've happened to Holli if Umberlee hadn't intervened.

AD_CellarWaveservantsChat_3.speaker: Dark Breaker Ohara Ohira
AD_CellarWaveservantsChat_3.text: But we might've been able to save her!

AD_CellarWaveservantsChat_12.speaker: Dark Breaker Ohara Ohira
AD_CellarWaveservantsChat_12.text: Maybe she would've still been alive if those fishers didn't pull her out of the water...

AD_CellarWaveservantsChat_8.speaker: Seawind Tinsy Ralpp
AD_CellarWaveservantsChat_8.text: We can't know that. I'm sure Umberlee's decision was the right one - we have to trust in her.

AD_CellarWaveservantsChat_6.speaker: Dark Breaker Ohara Ohira
AD_CellarWaveservantsChat_6.context: NodeContext: Gently but firmly; trying to reassure her friend

AD_CellarWaveservantsChat_5.speaker: Seawind Tinsy Ralpp
AD_CellarWaveservantsChat_5.context: NodeContext: Seems pretty confident Umberlee will protect them

AD_CellarWaveservantsChat_18.speaker: Seawind Tinsy Ralpp
AD_CellarWaveservantsChat_18.context: NodeContext: Snapping "Ohara!"; hushed on the rest in case their goddess hears

AD_CellarWaveservantsChat_17.speaker: Dark Breaker Ohara Ohira
AD_CellarWaveservantsChat_17.text: I'm sure Umberlee has much more important things to worry about.

AD_CellarWaveservantsChat_9.speaker: Seawind Tinsy Ralpp
AD_CellarWaveservantsChat_9.context: NodeContext: Worried that their goddess will overhear them

AD_CellarWaveservantsChat_13.speaker: Dark Breaker Ohara Ohira
AD_CellarWaveservantsChat_13.text: I still can't believe Holli's gone.

AD_CellarWaveservantsChat_4.speaker: Seawind Tinsy Ralpp
AD_CellarWaveservantsChat_4.text: I know. But we'll always remember her, won't we?

AD_CellarWaveservantsChat_7.speaker: Seawind Tinsy Ralpp
AD_CellarWaveservantsChat_7.text: And Umberlee will carry her safely to the Deep Wilds.

AD_CellarWaveservantsChat_14.speaker: Dark Breaker Ohara Ohira
AD_CellarWaveservantsChat_14.context: NodeContext: As if saying a prayer; similar tone to saying "amen"

AD_CellarWaveservantsChat_1.speaker: Seawind Tinsy Ralpp
AD_CellarWaveservantsChat_1.context: NodeContext: As if saying a prayer; similar tone to saying "amen"

GuardWaveservant01_0.speaker: Dark Breaker Vilmina
GuardWaveservant01_0.text: There's nothing for you up here, flotsam. Back downstairs you go.

GuardWaveservant01_1.speaker: Dark Breaker Vilmina
GuardWaveservant01_1.text: Stop! These are the Flood Tide's chambers - you've no business here, flotsam.

GuardWaveservant01_2.speaker: Dark Breaker Vilmina
GuardWaveservant01_2.text: You'd better have a very good offering in hand if you're being this much of a pain.
